reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater to be well-made with a pretty color that hasn't faded, and appreciate its softness, lightweight feel, and comfort.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic sweater for fall
items.body: I ordered the Medium size and fits just right. The material is fairly soft and honestly, I would generally not buy my clothes from Amazon but thought I would give these a try. Iâ€™ve bought pajamas before, but not clothes Iâ€™d wear going out. This sweater is very well made, of a medium weight (you still feel air through, but can wear a thin layer underneath). The style is what I consider a â€œclassicâ€ cable sweater that will last the test of time. It looks a bit short on me, but thatâ€™s probably bc Iâ€™m top heavy. The model on the Amazon picture seems to have what appears to be a longer sweater, but again I think it depends on how big your chest is, it will sit lower or higher. Overall, this is a great sweater for a very low price and I recommend it. (Bought in white also.) Read more
items.author: Cactus Flower

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, nicer than expected fit ðŸ†
items.body: At almost 5â€™10â€ and 145 to 150 fit build wasnâ€™t sure if a small would be too snug. Based on reviews saying it runs larger size wise was hoping for a no skin tight though loose form fit. With the knit pattern expected this would be flattering. Delivered and then some. The softness of the fabric material and style looks high end at a fantastic price. I tried this on without an under top and the knit is soft. Not itchy though looks wool light, The tailoring and V are idyllic. Slap on a known local like Polo and boom, this classic fit, style, and cut is classic. Will thrive in any fashion climate, in my view. I havenâ€™t received the light color, looks like an Irish sweater yet. But Iâ€™m excited in the anticipation the color will melt well with my winter skin tone. Yes yes yes give this sweater a tryâ­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ðŸ† Read more
items.author: #AskMissPatience

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater, looks great
items.body: It's comfortable, tight-fitting and looks great. It's a nice soft sweater, not too heavy. The pink is feminine and pretty. Read more
items.author: Blackmustangirl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: This sweater was nice. It fit well. The color was slightly different than what I saw on the picture and the sleeves were a bit long. But overall, it fit well and was as well-made. The material felt like quality material and overall a good purchase for your money. Read more
items.author: Alicia Stevens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and weight to material.
items.body: I really like the fit of this sweater. It is not too long and comes just to top of hips, which I like. The quality of the material is good and the weight of the material is perfect. It feels nice on with some warmth to it but not too bulky. I really liked the red color (for Christmas). Definitely a bright red. I liked the fit so much, tried the khaki, but too much pink in it for me. Read more
items.author: World traveler wanna be

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great quality but runs big
items.body: Cute but runs big. I am 5â€™5â€ 112 lbs with a shorter waist. This sweater drowns me. Color is a brighter red. It is a great weight and soft. I will probably give it to my sister or wear over leggings. Read more
items.author: Preston Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic ribbed sweater
items.body: Love this sweater! It fits beautifully, washes beautifully, and looks as good as in the picture! Read more
items.author: wwgliermxyopc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it!
items.body: Very nice, not too heavy or too thin! Royal blue color is pretty. Size medium fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Michelle Clancy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Indigo Blue, Deep Green, Apricot, Black, Navy Blue, Light Blue, Red, Khaki Tan, Pink, Cream White, Yellow, Royal Blue, Light Purple, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
